title: Online Resident Portal, GOFit Fitness Center, Prime Location
posting_body: Located in Southfield, Michigan, Radius at Ten Mile is a beautiful community that you would be proud to call home.
Our exceptional apartments and impressive community amenities paired with our gracious team will surpass all of your expectations.
Property Amenities:
Private Patio, Juliet Balcony or Full Balcony in Most Apartments
Modern Backsplash
Online Resident Portal
Pet Friendly
Community Clubhouse
Gas Fireplaces in Many Models
Pantry Closet
Spacious 1 BR, 2BR & 2 BR-plus Loft Apartments 1-2 ½ Baths
Stainless Steel Appliances
Hotel Style Card Access Security Lock at Apartment Entry
Prime Location
Top Floor Lofts with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights
